lead_paragraph: India captain Virat Kohli won the toss and decided to bat first against a New Zealand side playing without their regular skipper Kane Williamson for the second test at Eden Gardens on Friday.

headline.print_headline: India Opt to Bat Against New Zealand in Kolkata
headline.main: India Opt to Bat Against New Zealand in Kolkata

snippet: India captain Virat Kohli won the toss and decided to bat first against a New Zealand side playing without their regular skipper Kane Williamson for the second test at Eden Gardens on Friday....
